title: Studio in East Hollywood w/ Gas Range + Outdoor Lounge
posting_body: ['Very charming studio inside a Beautiful Old Hollywood-style building.', 'Located right off Fountain, walking distance from many restaurants and shops.', 'Less than a 5-minute drive to Silver Lake, Los Feliz, and Virgil Village.', 'There is only 1 apartment available.', 'The exposed brick wall makes this one a gem!', '\u200b\u200b\u200b\u200b\u200b\u200b\u200bYou also have access to a common area w/ BBQ — host the dinner party of your dreams, under charming string lights.', 'Other amenities include Bike storage and in-building laundry.', 'Come see it today.', 'APARTMENT AMENITIES', 'Ceiling Fans', 'Microwave', 'Vinyl Plank Flooring', 'Refrigerator', 'Gas Range', 'COMMUNITY AMENITIES', 'Controlled Access', 'Laundry On-Site', 'Bike Storage', 'Outdoor BBQ', 'Outdoor Lounge', 'Interested in living here?', 'We would love to hear from you!', 'Get in touch with one of our community specialists who can help you find the perfect home!', '<URL>', 'For appointment or for questions, call today at', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at <URL>/', '1172 North New Hampshire Avenue', 'Los Angeles, CA 90029', 'Advertised unit availability, rental rates, terms and conditions are subject to change without notice.', 'Square Footage Is Approximate.']
